plot: In this poignant modern-life tale from the outskirts of the former Soviet Union, a lonely cab driver's off-hours hobby takes an unpredictable twist.
title: The Receiver
plot_es: In this poignant modern-life tale from the outskirts of the former Soviet Union, a lonely cab driver's off-hours hobby takes an unpredictable twist.
plot_en: In this poignant modern-life tale from the outskirts of the former Soviet Union, a lonely cab driver's off-hours hobby takes an unpredictable twist.
